div.bibl: Sonntagpost (Sunday Edition of Abendpost), Sept. 20, 1919. GERMAN-AMERICAN AID

body.p: The German-American Aid acknowledged receipt of the following contributions:
Envelope collection at mass meeting held September 19:
[Translator's note: These are the largest and smallest contributions. The article lists the names of sixty-three other contributors. Their donations totaled $84.75, making a grand total of $185.25.]
